title: x/net/{ipv4, ipv6}: build fails on go1.4 and below
body:
It appears that net/ipv4 and net/ipv6 fail to build when getting net/icmp. Ping @mikioh since he seemed to have authored this package.

```
$ go version
go version go1.4.1 linux/amd64
```

```
$ go get -u golang.org/x/net/icmp
# golang.org/x/net/ipv4
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:7: sysIP_TOS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:7
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:8: sysIP_TTL redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:8
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:9: sysIP_HDRINCL redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:9
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:10: sysIP_OPTIONS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:10
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:11: sysIP_ROUTER_ALERT redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:11
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:12: sysIP_RECVOPTS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:12
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:13: sysIP_RETOPTS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:13
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:14: sysIP_PKTINFO redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:14
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:15: sysIP_PKTOPTIONS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:15
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:16: sysIP_MTU_DISCOVER redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_amd64.go:16
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv4/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:16: too many errors
# golang.org/x/net/ipv6
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:7: sysIPV6_ADDRFORM redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:7
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:8: sysIPV6_2292PKTINFO redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:8
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:9: sysIPV6_2292HOPOPTS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:9
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:10: sysIPV6_2292DSTOPTS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:10
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:11: sysIPV6_2292RTHDR redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:11
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:12: sysIPV6_2292PKTOPTIONS redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:12
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:13: sysIPV6_CHECKSUM redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:13
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:14: sysIPV6_2292HOPLIMIT redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:14
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:15: sysIPV6_NEXTHOP redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:15
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:16: sysIPV6_FLOWINFO redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at /home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_amd64.go:16
/home/ulfr/Code/go/bin/src/golang.org/x/net/ipv6/zsys_linux_ppc64.go:16: too many errors
```
